detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test cases are based on this design, and also cover the configuration options. Expected test coverage (100%) and type of test coverage (C1). For more details please see Test List.

sect1.title: Verification of Resource Consumption
sect1.para:
DWAX is an extension of DWA, which is a subcomponent of the ZV_Lib and the resource consumptions are estimated for the entire composition. Esitmatied Resource consumption for component:
Component
CPU Load
ROM
RAM
NVM
DWAX
0.0, 0.12%, 0.0
8.3 KB
0.12 KB
0.006 KB
Note The CPU value is for each processor (Core0, Core1 and Core2).

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The verification of the SWDD is performed by review. The review template can be found here [CA050003801 SDD Review Template]. The review results can be found here [SDD Review Results] The review is available in git. Any points linked to JIRA tickes, see History section

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The tests are created using SWATT and are available in *.c.test files. For more details check the File section.
